alert.note: Alert for Audubon; Calhoun; Carroll; Greene (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 15 at 5:35PM CST until December 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CST FOR GREENE... NORTHEASTERN AUDUBON...SOUTHERN CALHOUN AND EASTERN CARROLL COUNTIES... At 534 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located 2 miles west of Jefferson, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Coon Rapids, Glidden, Grand Junction, Scranton, Churdan, Dedham, Lidderdale, Lanesboro, Willey, Ralston, Hobbs County Park, Arthur N Neu Airport and Jefferson Municipal Airport. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
